page.title: 07St Peter's Church,Stapenhill
page.content: St Peter's church is quiet and peaceful like any other church.It is shaped like a cross.St Peter's church has a tower which is quite tall. Churches are very popular.Some people go to church everyweek.Church is very important for some people. When we walk inside the church a man gives you your hymn book.Then we go and find a seat and listen to the vicar who talks about Jesus.Then we have prayers and sing hymns. St Peter's church is at the side of Stapenhill Gardens.There are some pretty flowers in there. People have weddings and christenings in the church.At Christmas our school go to the church and we have a christmas service.We sing christmas carols and each "year" sings a song. Vicars are friendly,they are just like anybody else.
